name: Zoo Pals
description:
This game is a location-based Augmented Reality game made specifically to be played at the St. Louis Zoo.

The animals need your help! The zookeepers got the animals' food mixed up today, and we need someone to help us sort it out.

We need you to go see the animals to find out who got the wrong food, and make sure everyone has the food they need. After you're done feeding, you can even help us with Animal Enrichment to make sure everyone is as happy as possible.

Zoo Pals is created to provide an fun and educational experience for visitors of all ages at the St. Louis Zoo.

To play, simply download the TaleBlazer application on your mobile device, then open the TaleBlazer menu, select "Game Code," then enter in the "Zoo Pals" game code to play:

gofyhav
